definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: (Gerber:90) commit iniquity, do wrong (Aram. [[עוי]] commit sin, [[עֲוׇיׇא]] sin, cf. Levy:NHWB iii. 626);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (late) Pf. 3 fs. [[עָֽוְתָה]] Es 1:16 she hath done wrong (c. [[עַל]]); 1 pl. [[עָוִינוּ]] Da 9:5 we have committed iniquity (‖[[חָטָא]]).
